attributes.action: create an equal minimum wage for workers under 18.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many children in the UK who work part time in Saturday jobs. But unlike for adult workers, who have aminimum wage of £5.80 per hour, there is no minimum wage for under 16s, and only £3.57 per hour minimum wage for 16-18 year olds. By signing this, you are challenging this unfair discrimination against young people. If a young person works just as hard at the same job, he should get the exactly same pay rate as an adult.
